title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
OB: The CVS repository view is not maximized after switching from the Java perspective to the resource perspective and then back to the Java perspective.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized when switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Open the Eclipse IDE and go to the Java perspective.
2. Open the CVS repository view if it is not already open.
3. Double click the title bar of the CVS repository view to maximize it.
4. Switch to the resource perspective.
5. Switch back to the Java perspective.
6. Observe the maximized state of the CVS repository view.
